product_name: Hiking the Wonderland Trail: The Complete Guide to Mount Rainier's Premier Trail
long_description: . Author: Tami Asars. Softcover; 256 pages; color photographs and maps. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2012. Tami Asars covers how to work with the permit system and when to apply, how to pack the perfect backpack, and how to extend the trip with the Northern Loop and Eastside Trail. Includes recommended gear and checklist, as well as ways to reduce pack weight, prevent blisters and stay warm and dry. Detailed camp-to-camp route descriptions, elevation profiles and suggested itineraries help you along the trail. .
short_description: Hiking the Wonderland Trail: The Complete Guide to Mount Rainier's Premier Trail guides you through the ins and outs of undertaking this memorable hiking trip around Mount Rainier.
